title: Live Line & Cricket Scores - Cricket Exchange

creator: Cricket Exchange
descriptionHtml:
⚡️ Cricket Exchange is a Cricket Live Line which provides you Ultra-Fast Live Cricket Score with accurate Odds with History, Session & Lambi with Audio Speech & Ball to Ball Update. Even you can Pin Score in Background if you’re a Premium User 🤩

🏆 Follow Caribbean Premier League 2020 & Indian Premier League 2020 with Cricket Exchange. We also cover all cricketing series & tournaments featuring World Cup, Champions Trophy, Big Bash League, T20 Blast, County Cricket, All Cricketing Tours & much more.

It’s a must-have an app for all the cricket lovers. Following are the features of our app:-

⭐️ What's New?
• Now Available in Hindi, English & Bengali
• Simple and interactive LIVE screen.
• Session up-down indicator
• Team Odds with colour
• More details about batsmen and bowlers in Live match.
• Team Form & Venue Score Pattern in Match Info
• Player’s Picture in Playing XI


🔴 Watch Multiple LIVE Matches at the same time


⚾️ Complete Live Match Details
• Live Ball to Ball Updates
• Accurate Team Odds with colour
• Session & Lambi with up-down indicator
• Audio Speech for all Score & Odds updates
• Complete Scorecard with Auto-Refresh
• Match Info with Playing XI, Team Squad, Head to Head, Venue Scoring Patterns and much more


📅 Fixtures
• Interactive Fixtures
• Categorized match Schedule (Date-wise, Series-wise & Team-wise)
• Complete Info of Upcoming matches
• Summary of Finished matches


🏆 Series, League & Tournaments Details
• Team-wise Squads
• Interactive Series Fixtures
• Latest Points Table


📰 Latest News & Featured Videos
• Videos with Pre-Match Reports.
• Latest news about Cricket happening
• Cricket Facts and Records.


🥇 ICC Rankings
• Team Rankings
• Batsman Rankings
• Bowler Rankings
• All Rounders Rankings
• For both Men & Women


💵 Premium Version at discounted price*
• Enjoy Live scores with completely NO ADS
• Complete Access to Odds & Session History
• Pin Live Score & watch Ball by Ball Live scores while using other apps
• Background Speech in Pin Score


🏏 Coverage of all International T20s, ODIs, TESTs, Tours, Leagues including:
• Indian Premier League 2020 (IPL 2020)
• Caribbean Premier League 2020 (CPL 2020)
• Pakistan tour of England 2020
• European Cricket Series (ECS)
• Australia tour of England 2020
descriptionShort: Cricket Live Line & Live Cricket Score, Odds, Session, News & Fixtures | CPL20

- Support of Bengali language
- Support of Hindi language
- Reduced loading time

- New Live Screen
- Available in Hindi, English and Bengali language

title: Cricket Exchange - Live Score & Analysis

container.value:
Vatika Business Centre
Suite No. 53, 3rd Floor, Vatika Atrium, Block - B
Golf Course Road, Sector 53
Gurugram, Haryana, India (IN)
Pin: 122002

creator: Cricket Exchange
descriptionHtml:
👋🏻 Hello Cricket Fans! Introducing brand new version of Cricket Exchange.

⚡️ Cricket Exchange ensure that it simplify your cricket analysis. Cricket Exchange is committed to provide you with Live Scores, and analysis of a Cricket match in most unique & entertaining way. Moreover, it shows accurate and ball by ball updated odds of a match as well as session with audio speech for accessibility.

🏆 Follow Live Cricket Score of Indian Premier League 2021 (IPL 2021) with Cricket Exchange. Predominantly, we cover all ICC tournaments and tours. We also cover all domestic leagues like IPL, Big Bash League, PSL, Abu Dhabi T10 league, T20 Blast, County Cricket, Super 50 Cup and a lot more.

You can PIN live score in background, if you’re a premium customer. You will also be provided with entire information about a live match including Live ball by ball commentary, team squads, detailed scorecard with wicket elaboration and partnership stats, playing squads, insights from past clashes, recent forms of players, venue stats, and what not.

Unique Features:
💬 Find Ball by Ball Commentary of any Live match inside Commentary tab.
📌 PIN Live Score allows you to watch score of any live match over other apps.
🕵🏻‍♂️ Tap any Player and get in-depth Career profile.
🎤 Speech Accessibility helps you to hear Live match instances.
🔔 Get a notification when team / player reach any milestone or any wicket falls down.


Informative Displays:
🏏 Home
- Featured Matches
- Multiple Live Matches
- Live, Upcoming and Finished matches
- Date-wise and Series-wise matches
- Fixtures

🔴 Live
- Ball by ball Live Score
- Accurate odds and session

💬 Commentary
- Live Commentary
- Main events' prompts
- New batsman/bowler stats

📊 Scorecard
- Detailed scorecard of both teams
- Wicket Description
- Partnership details

⚔️ Match Info & Stats
- Both teams' playing XI
- Pitch Report & venue scoring pattern
- Points Table
- Head to Head past clashes stats
- Team recent form

There is a premium subscription for the app too. It’s considerably reasonable and comes with features that have never been offered before like odds' history & graphs, PIN Live scores & odds and Ad-free experience.

Enjoy Live scores with Better, Faster & More Reliable Version of Cricket Exchange!

We are bringing back the series clubbed match cards at home, we feel that this worked for you better and so here it is!

2. Live Tab is back
It’s easy to check live matches from live tab, we missed that too so we’re bringing it back on high demand.

3. Ads reduced
We have reduced ads and we hope you will love it!

title: Cricket Exchange - Live Score & Analysis

container.value:
Vatika Business Centre
Suite No. 53, 3rd Floor, Vatika Atrium, Block - B
Golf Course Road, Sector 53
Gurugram, Haryana, India (IN)
Pin: 122002

creator: Cricket Exchange
descriptionHtml:
👋🏻 Hello Cricket Fans! Introducing brand new version of Cricket Exchange.

⚡️ Cricket Exchange ensure that it simplify your cricket analysis. Cricket Exchange is committed to provide you with Live Scores, and analysis of a Cricket match in most unique & entertaining way. Moreover, it shows accurate and ball by ball updated odds of a match as well as session with audio speech for accessibility.

🏆 Follow Live Cricket Score of Pakistan Super League 2021 (PSL 2021) & World Test Championship 2021 with Cricket Exchange. Predominantly, we cover all ICC tournaments and tours. We also cover all domestic leagues like IPL, Big Bash League, PSL, Abu Dhabi T10 league, T20 Blast, County Cricket, Super 50 Cup and a lot more.

You can PIN live score in background, if you’re a premium customer. You will also be provided with entire information about a live match including Live ball by ball commentary, team squads, detailed scorecard with wicket elaboration and partnership stats, playing squads, insights from past clashes, recent forms of players, venue stats, and what not.

Unique Features:
💬 Find Ball by Ball Commentary of any Live match inside Commentary tab.
📌 PIN Live Score allows you to watch score of any live match over other apps.
🕵🏻‍♂️ Tap any Player and get in-depth Career profile.
🎤 Speech Accessibility helps you to hear Live match instances.
🔔 Get a notification when team / player reach any milestone or any wicket falls down.


Informative Displays:
🏏 Home
- Featured Matches
- Multiple Live Matches
- Live, Upcoming and Finished matches
- Date-wise and Series-wise matches
- Fixtures

🔴 Live
- Ball by ball Live Score
- Accurate odds and session

💬 Commentary
- Live Commentary
- Main events' prompts
- New batsman/bowler stats

📊 Scorecard
- Detailed scorecard of both teams
- Wicket Description
- Partnership details

⚔️ Match Info & Stats
- Both teams' playing XI
- Pitch Report & venue scoring pattern
- Points Table
- Head to Head past clashes stats
- Team recent form

There is a premium subscription for the app too. It’s considerably reasonable and comes with features that have never been offered before like odds' history & graphs, PIN Live scores & odds and Ad-free experience.

Enjoy Live scores with Better, Faster & More Reliable Version of Cricket Exchange!
descriptionShort: Follow PSL 2021 with Live Cricket Score, Commentary, Odds, News & Fixtures.

creator: Cricket Exchange
descriptionHtml:
👋 Are you very passionate about Cricket all around the world? Do you hate going out and not being in front of a TV during a match? Don’t worry! It’s been taken care of.

⚡️ Cricket Exchange ensure that it simplify your cricketing information. It’s committed to provide you with Live Scores, and analysis of a Cricket match in most unique & entertaining way which includes -

- Live ball by ball commentary
- Realtime win percentage
- Detailed scorecard with wicket description and partnership stats
- Insightful pre-match info and analysis

🏆 Follow Live Cricket Score of All International Tours including India tour of Sri Lanka 2021, Pakistan tour of England 2021, Australia tour of West Indies 2021 and much more with Cricket Exchange. Predominantly, we cover all ICC tournaments and tours. However, we also cover all domestic leagues like IPL, Big Bash League, PSL, Abu Dhabi T10 league, T20 Blast, County Cricket, Super 50 Cup and a lot more.

Unique Features:
💬 One place for entire details and stats of all active series.
📌 PIN Live Score allows you to watch score of any live match over other apps.
🕵️ Tap any Player and get in-depth Career profile.
🎤 Speech Accessibility helps you to hear Live match instances.
🔔 Get a notification when team / player reach any milestone or any wicket falls down.


Informative Tabs:

🏏 Home
- Featured Matches
- Multiple Live Matches
- Upcoming and Finished matches
- Top Headlines

💬 Series
- Series info and stats
- Points table and Teams Squads
- News related to any active series
- Previous seasons of any series/tournament

🔴 Fixtures
- Days-wise, Series-wise and Teams-wise matches
- Matches are further classified into International, T20, ODI, Test, League and Women

📊 News
- Latest News
- Trendy Editorials

⚔️ More
- ICC Men’s Ranking
- ICC Women’s ranking
- Change app language
- Details about Premium version

If you’re a premium customer, you can PIN live score in background. Yes, there is a premium subscription for the app too. It’s quite reasonable and comes with features that have never been offered before like odds' history & graphs, PIN Live scores & odds and Ad-free experience.

Download the app and enjoy Live Cricket with Better, Faster & More Reliable Version of Cricket Exchange!

creator: Cricket Exchange
descriptionHtml:
👋 Are you enthusiastic about Cricket across the world? Do you hate going out and not being in front of a TV during a match? Don’t worry! It’s been taken care of.

⚡️ Cricket Exchange is committed to provide you with Live Scores, and Analysis of a Cricket match in most unique & engaging manner which includes -

- Live ball by ball commentary
- Realtime win percentage
- Detailed scorecard with wicket description and partnership stats
- Insightful pre-match info and analysis

🏆 Follow Live Cricket Score of All International Tours including India tour of England 2021, CPL 2021, New Zealand tour of Bangladesh 2021, and South Africa tour of Sri Lanka 2021 with Cricket Exchange. Predominantly, we cover all ICC tournaments and tours. However, we also cover all domestic leagues like IPL, Big Bash League, PSL, Abu Dhabi T10 league, T20 Blast, County Cricket, Super 50 Cup and a lot more.

Unique Features:
📊 Analytical Graphs can be leveraged to analyse teams’ performances on different scales.
💬 One place for entire details and stats of all active series.
📌 PIN Live Score allows you to watch score of any live match over other apps.
🕵️ Tap any Player and get in-depth Career profile.
🎢 Switch to dark/light theme at your own preference, anytime
🔔 Get a notification for all live match instances and Breaking News!!

Informative Tabs:

🏏 Home
- Multiple Live Matches
- Upcoming and Finished matches

💬 Series
- Series info and stats
- Points table and Teams Squads

🔴 Fixtures
- Days-wise, Series-wise and Teams-wise matches
- Matches are further classified into International, T20, ODI, Test, League and Women

- ICC Men’s Ranking
- ICC Women’s ranking
- Change app language
- Details about Premium version

creator: Cricket Exchange
descriptionHtml:
👋 Are you enthusiastic about Cricket across the world? Do you hate going out and not being in front of a TV during a match? Don’t worry! It’s been taken care of.

⚡️ Cricket Exchange is committed to provide you with Live Scores, and Analysis of a Cricket match in most unique & engaging manner which includes -

- Live ball by ball commentary
- Realtime win percentage
- Detailed scorecard with wicket description and partnership stats
- Insightful pre-match info and analysis

🏆 Follow Live Cricket Score of All International Tours including ICC Men's T20 World Cup with Cricket Exchange. Predominantly, we cover all ICC tournaments and tours. However, we also cover all domestic leagues like IPL, Big Bash League, PSL, Abu Dhabi T10 league, T20 Blast, County Cricket, Super 50 Cup and a lot more.

Unique Features:
📊 Analytical Graphs can be leveraged to analyse teams’ performances on different scales.
💬 One place for entire details and stats of all active series.
📌 PIN Live Score allows you to watch score of any live match over other apps.
🕵️ Tap any Player and get in-depth Career profile.
🎢 Switch to dark/light theme at your own preference, anytime
🔔 Get a notification for all live match instances and Breaking News!!

Informative Tabs:

🏏 Home
- Multiple Live Matches
- Upcoming and Finished matches

💬 Series
- Series info and stats
- Points table and Teams Squads

🔴 Fixtures
- Days-wise, Series-wise and Teams-wise matches
- Matches are further classified into International, T20, ODI, Test, League and Women

📊 News
- Latest News
- Trendy Editorials

⚔️ More
- ICC Men’s Ranking
- ICC Women’s ranking
- Change app language
- Details about Premium version

If you’re a premium customer, you can PIN live score in background. Yes, there is a premium subscription for the app too. It’s quite reasonable and comes with features that have never been offered before like odds' history & graphs, PIN Live scores & odds and Ad-free experience.

Download the app and enjoy Cricket with Better, Faster & More Reliable Version of Cricket Exchange!

descriptionHtml:
Looking for a one-stop app for all things cricket?🤔 👀
Look no further, we have the best app for an enthusiast like you.

CREX is here to transform your Live Cricket Experience knowing the fact that Cricket is more than a game to you. From Live score updates & commentary to fantasy analysis & Cricket Search, everything you need to know about your favourite sport is covered here in the most unique and engaging manner. CREX covers:

- Fantasy tips and top picks
- Live ball by ball commentary
- Real-time win percentage and fan polls
- Detailed scorecard with wicket description and partnership stats
- Insightful pre-match info and analysis
- Detailed rankings, points table, & records
- And a lot more

🏆 Follow Live Cricket Score of all tours & leagues including Indian Premier League 2022 with CREX. We extensively cover all ICC tournaments and tours. We also cover all domestic leagues like IPL, BBL, PSL, BPL, Abu Dhabi T10 league, Super Smash, T20 Blast, County Cricket, Super 50 Cup and a lot more.

Unique Features:

📊 Get deep insights and improve your cricket analysis with graphs.
💬 Find detailed information related to any active series.
📌 Keep track of live scores anytime, anywhere with Pin Live score.
🕵️ Tap any player or team and get in-depth stats & analysis.
🚦 Switch between light and dark themes whenever you like.
🔔 Notifications for all live & upcoming matches, key events, & Breaking News !!!
🏏 Analyse, create and track your cricket fantasy team.
🔭 Find anything related to your favourite sport with Cricket Search

Informative Tabs:

🏏 Home
- Multiple Live Matches
- Upcoming and Finished matches

💬 Series
- Complete series info and stats

- Top Performing Players and Teams Squads

- Days-wise, Series-wise and Teams-wise matches

Vatika Business Centre
Vatika Atrium, Block - B
Golf Course Road, Sector 53
Gurugram, Haryana, India (IN)
Pin: 122002

creator: Cricket Exchange
descriptionHtml:
Looking for a one-stop app for all things cricket?🤔 👀
Look no further, we have the best app for an enthusiast like you.

CREX is here to transform your Live Cricket Experience knowing the fact that Cricket is more than a game to you. From Live score updates & commentary to fantasy analysis & Cricket Search, everything you need to know about your favourite sport is covered here in the most unique and engaging manner. CREX covers:

- Fantasy tips and top picks
- Live ball by ball commentary
- Real-time win percentage and fan polls
- Detailed scorecard with wicket description and partnership stats
- Insightful pre-match info and analysis
- Detailed rankings, points table, & records
- And a lot more

🏆 Follow Live Cricket Score of all tours & leagues including India vs England 2022 with CREX. We extensively cover all ICC tournaments and tours. We also cover all domestic leagues like IPL, BBL, PSL, BPL, Abu Dhabi T10 league, Super Smash, T20 Blast, County Cricket, Super 50 Cup and a lot more.

Unique Features:

📊 Get deep insights and improve your cricket analysis with graphs.
💬 Find detailed information related to any active series.
📌 Keep track of live scores anytime, anywhere with Pin Live score.
🕵️ Tap any player or team and get in-depth stats & analysis.
🚦 Switch between light and dark themes whenever you like.
🔔 Notifications for all live & upcoming matches, key events, & Breaking News !!!
🏏 Analyse, create and track your cricket fantasy team.
🔭 Find anything related to your favourite sport with Cricket Search

Informative Tabs:

🏏 Home
- Multiple Live Matches
- Upcoming and Finished matches

💬 Series
- Complete series info and stats
- Points table
- Top Performing Players and Teams Squads

🔴 Fixtures
- Days-wise, Series-wise and Teams-wise matches
- Matches are further classified into International, T20, ODI, Test, League and Women

📊 News
- Latest Cricket News & updates
- Articles, Breaking News, & much more

➕ More
- ICC Men’s Ranking
- ICC Women’s ranking
- Choose your preferred language- available in English, Hindi, & Bengali.

Details about Premium version:
If you’re a premium customer, you can PIN live score in the background. Yes, there is a premium subscription for the app too. It’s quite reasonable and comes with features that have never been offered before like Odds' History, Graphs, PIN Live Scores. Go premium to experience the best cricket app, ad-free.

Download the app and enjoy Cricket with Better, Faster & More Reliable Version of CREX
descriptionShort: Live Cricket Score, Analysis, Commentary & News | India vs England 2022

appDetails.developerAddress:
Vatika Business Centre
Vatika Atrium, Block - B
Golf Course Road, Sector 53
Gurugram, Haryana, India (IN)
Pin: 122002
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Brand New Icon: The refreshed logo of CREX reflects the way the app tries to reinvent the live cricket experience.
- Calendar view on fixtures: View matches and their fixtures in a calendar format to make your game-day plans easier!
- Advanced fixture filters: You can find matches and fixtures with specific filters to find the games you’d love and enjoy.
- Matches on My Team: Follow the progress of your favourite team by adding them to ‘My Team’.

Looking to exchange your love for cricket with a companion? 🤔 👀
Search no further, here’s the best one-stop-app for all things cricket.

CREX is where all the cricketing action takes place. We are here to transform your Live Cricket Experience knowing that Cricket is more than a game to you. From Live score updates & match highlights to fantasy analysis & exclusive cricket videos by cricket experts like Akash Chopra; everything you need to know about your favourite sport is covered here in the most unique and engaging manner.

We have partnered with Fancode to bring you live cricket streaming to your mobile screen. Now you also can watch live cricket that is exclusively available in India on the CREX app.

CREX covers:
- All international and domestic cricket matches
- Live Cricket streaming on CREX app.
- Exclusive cricket videos and match highlights.
- Every important happenings in the cricket world
- Fantasy tips and top picks
- Live ball by ball commentary
- Detailed scorecard with wicket description and partnership stats
- Insightful pre-match info and analysis
- Detailed rankings, points table, & records
- And a lot more

🏆Follow Cricket Score & Updates of all tours & leagues including SA 20 League 2025, Ireland Women Tour of India 2025, International League T20 2025, Champions Trophy, Women Ashes 2025, U19 Women's T20 World Cup 2025, Women's Premier League 2025, England Tour of India 2025, England vs New Zealand, etc. with CREX. We cover all tournaments, tours, and leagues including but not limited to World Cup, IPL, BBL, PSL, BPL, Abu Dhabi T10 league, Super Smash, T20 Blast, County Cricket, Super 50 Cup.

Unique Features:

👨‍💻 Follow interesting insights and all important updates.
🏏 Get free expert fantasy cricket tips, create teams and rank on our Leaderboard.
📊Get deep insights and improve your cricket analysis with graphs.
👓 Read match summaries with video highlights and more.
💁 Find detailed information related to any active series.
📌 Keep track of live scores anytime, anywhere with Pin Live score.
🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Tap any player or team and get in-depth stats & analysis.
🌈 Switch between light and dark themes whenever you like.
⚡️ Notifications for all live & upcoming matches, key events, & Breaking News.
🔍 Find anything related to your favourite sport with Cricket Search.
🕵️‍♂️ Become a cricket guru by taking daily cricket quizzes.

Informative Tabs:

🏡 Home
- Cricket insights
- Team updates
- Live happenings
- Cricket stories, shorts, and reels

🏏 Matches
- All Live Matches
- Personalised Match info
- Live match streaming
- Exclusive cricket videos
- Upcoming and Finished matches

🏆 Series
- Complete series info and stats
- Points table
- Top Performing Players and Teams Squads
- News and videos

📌 Fixtures
- Days-wise, Series-wise and Teams-wise matches
- Matches are further classified into International, T20, ODI, Test, League and Women
- Follow your favourite teams

🗞 News
- Latest Cricket News & updates
- Articles, Breaking News, & much more

➕ More
- Men’s Ranking
- Women’s ranking
- Choose your preferred language- available in English, Hindi, & Bengali.

Details about Premium version 🌟:
If you’re a premium customer, you can PIN live score in the background. Yes, there is a premium subscription for the app too. It’s quite reasonable and comes with features that have never been offered before like Odds’ History, Graphs, PIN Live Scores. Go premium to experience the best cricket app, ad-free.
Download the app and enjoy Cricket with a Better, Faster & More Reliable version of CREX.
descriptionShort: Cricket is Nonstop on CREX | Live match scores, commentary, stats, and news.
